title: Buy Manappuram Finance, target price Rs 166: Nirmal Bang Institutional Equities - Economic Times
content:

description: Manappuram Finance (Manappuram) reported yet another weak quarter, with net profit declining by 42.4% YoY on account of subdued growth in gold loan AUM and 19.6% YoY decline in NII.
